sentences.en: “She's got ants in her pants”(&b{Bobbie Ann Mason})
A lucky visitor to the ant city may see the queen.
sentences.cn: 幸运的蚁城访问者可能会看到蚁后.

sentences.en: Ant a java project generation tool with a flexible, user - friendly advantages.
sentences.cn: 英文原版资料. ant 作为java项目生成工具,具有灵活 、 易用的优点.

sentences.en: Ant algorithms analogize the social behaviour of ant colonies.
sentences.cn: 蚁群算法是一类模拟生物群体突现聚集行为的非经典算法.

sentences.en: Ant colony algorithms are robust and adaptable as novel optimization methods.
sentences.cn: 蚁群算法作为一种新型的优化方法,具有很强的鲁棒性和适应性.

sentences.en: Ant Colony Optimization is a novel optimization algorithm of simulated evolutionary algorithms.
sentences.cn: 蚁群优化算法是一种新型模拟进化的优化算法.

sentences.en: Ants swarmed up out of the ground and covered her shoes and legs.
sentences.cn: 蚂蚁从地里成群地爬出来，爬满了她的鞋和腿。

sentences.en: As it happens, in the wider world, there are other ant nests.
sentences.cn: 碰巧, 从全球范围看, 还有其它蚁巢.

sentences.en: Barbra Streisand : I'm not talking to you, you piss - ant little hick!
sentences.cn: 我没跟你说话, 你这个一文不值的小乡巴佬!

sentences.en: He later learned that another entomologist in New Jersey, 260 miles away, observed a wedding flight by the same species of ant, on the same day, and at exactly the same time!
sentences.cn: 他后来知道，在260英里以外纽泽西州另一个昆虫学家也观察到同一种类蚂蚁举行飞行婚礼的时间，竟和他记录的在同一天、同一个时刻！

sentences.en: In the ant city, queen's job is laying eggs.
sentences.cn: 在蚁蛘王国, 蚁后的工作是产卵.

sentences.en: In the dry season, it could be attacked by another species of ant.
sentences.cn: 在干燥的季节里,它可能会遭到另一个种类的蚂蚁攻击。

sentences.en: Now I know that action lion of terror ant of equanimity.
sentences.cn: 现在我明白了,行动可以让无比的恐惧变为泰然平静.

sentences.en: Of this quantity 15 % was added to thermoset ant 85 % to thermoplastic polymers.
sentences.cn: 其中15%加于热固性聚合物,85%加于热塑性聚合物.

sentences.en: One ant - hole may cause the collapse of a thousand - li dyke.
One ant hole may cause the collapse of a thousand - li dyke.
Pincers poised and eyes gleaming , a bulldog ant surveys its surroundings.
sentences.cn: 钳子平衡、眼睛雪亮, 一只“斗牛犬”蚁正在侦查环境.

sentences.en: The mild winter has created the ideal conditions for an ant population explosion.
sentences.cn: 暖冬为蚁群数量激增创造了理想的条件。

sentences.en: Tools like Ant, JUnit, XDoclet, Hibernate , and Spring can be difficult to get started with.
sentences.cn: 同时使用像Ant, JUnit, XDoclet, Hibernates 和Spring这样的工具是非常困难的.

trans.tran_en: a small insect that lives in large groups
a small insect that lives in large groups
